post.description:
Returns the top failures for the specified object. A types filter is required for this api.
Supported values are `platform`, `environment`, `control`, and `profile`.
By default, the top ten failed objects for the specified type are returned.
Supports filtering and respects `size` parameter.

Example:
```
{
"filters":[
{"type":"start_time","values":["2019-10-26T00:00:00Z"]},
{"type":"end_time","values":["2019-11-05T23:59:59Z"]},
{"type":"types","values":["platform","environment"]}
]
}
```

Authorization Action:
```
compliance:reportFailures:get
```

Returns statistics and summary information for profiles executed as part of the compliance reports. 
If called without specifying a profile ID (`id`), the API will return stats on all the profiles.
If the `id` field is provided (profile ID) as part of the query object, the `type` field must also be specified. Options are `controls` or `summary`.
Supports filtering.

```
{
"type":"controls",
"id":"09adcbb3b9b3233d5de63cd98a5ba3e155b3aaeb66b5abed379f5fb1ff143988",
"filters":[
{"type":"environment","values":["dev*"]},
{"type":"start_time","values":["2019-10-26T00:00:00Z"]},
{"type":"end_time","values":["2019-11-05T23:59:59Z"]}
]
}
```

Authorization Action:
```
compliance:reportProfiles:get
```

Returns summary statistics for compliance reports. 
General report summary information is the default. 
Adding a `type` value of `nodes` or `controls` will return summary statistics for that object.
Supports filtering.

Example:
```
{
"type":"nodes",
"filters":[
{"type":"environment","values":["dev*"]},
{"type":"start_time","values":["2019-10-26T00:00:00Z"]},
{"type":"end_time","values":["2019-11-05T23:59:59Z"]}
]
}
```

Authorization Action:
```
compliance:reportSummary:get
```

Returns trendgraph statistics for compliance reports. 
The `type` field is required for this api call. Options are `nodes` or `controls`.
Requires minimum `interval` field of 3600 and defined start time and end time filters.
Supports filtering.

Example:
```
{
"type":"nodes",
"interval":86400,
"filters":[
{"type":"environment","values":["dev*"]},
{"type":"start_time","values":["2019-10-26T00:00:00Z"]},
{"type":"end_time","values":["2019-11-05T23:59:59Z"]}
]
}
```

Authorization Action:
```
compliance:reportTrend:get
```

passed.description: Count of passed nodes that executed the control.

failed.description: Count of failed nodes that executed the control.

skipped.description: Count of skipped nodes that executed the control.

waived.description: Count of waived nodes that executed the control.

failures.description: The total number of failed controls in the reports.

majors.description: The total number of failed controls with an impact between 0.4 and 0.7.

minors.description: The total number of failed controls with an impact of 0.3 or less.

criticals.description: The total number of failed controls with an impact of 0.7 or higher.

passed.description: The total number of passed controls in the reports.

skipped.description: The total number of skipped controls in the reports.

waived.description: The total number of waived controls in the reports.

chef.automate.api.compliance.reporting.s.description: Statistics for the controls executed in the compliance reports.

id.description: ID of the object, included if applicable.

profiles.description: Top failed profiles across the infrastructure.

platforms.description: Top failed platforms across the infrastructure.

controls.description: Top failed controls across the infrastructure.

environments.description: Top failed environments across the infrastructure.

values.description: The list of values to filter on for the given type. We 'OR' between these fields.

compliant.description: The total number of nodes that passed their compliance scans.

skipped.description: The total number of nodes that skipped their compliance scans.

noncompliant.description: The total number of nodes that failed their compliance scans.

high_risk.description: The total number of nodes that failed their compliance scan with one or more control of critical impact.

medium_risk.description: The total number of nodes that failed their compliance scan with one or more control of major impact.

low_risk.description: The total number of nodes that failed their compliance scan with one or more control of minor impact.

waived.description: The total number of nodes with a waived compliance scan.

chef.automate.api.compliance.reporting.s.description: Statistics about the nodes scanned in the compliance reports.

profile_list.description: Set of statistics about the profiles executed in the reports.

control_stats.description: Summary information about a specific profile's control results across the reports.

failures.description: Total number of nodes that failed this profile.

majors.description: Total number of failed nodes with major control failures that executed the profile.

minors.description: Total number of failed nodes with minor control failures that executed the profile.

criticals.description: Total number of failed nodes with critical control failures that executed the profile.

passed.description: Total number of passed nodes that executed the profile.

skipped.description: Total number of skipped nodes that executed the profile.

waived.description: Total number of waived nodes that executed the profile.

copyright_email.description: Copyright email info for the profile.

supports.description: Supports information for the profile (which os it can run on).

depends.description: Dependency information about the profile (which profiles it inherits).

chef.automate.api.compliance.reporting.s.description: Summary information about a specific profile's execution across the reports.

failed.description: Total number of failed nodes that executed the profile.

passed.description: Total number of passed nodes that executed the profile.

skipped.description: Total number of skipped nodes that executed the profile.

waived.description: Total number of waived controls for the given profile across nodes.

chef.automate.api.compliance.reporting.s.description: Statistics about the nodes that executed the profile.

id.description: Unique identifier, such as a profile ID.

type.description: Type of data being requested, used for ReadTrend and ReadSummary.

size.description: The number of results to return (used when pagination is not supported).

interval.description: The interval to use for ReadTrend results, in integer seconds. Default of one hour, 3600.

sort.description: Sort the list of results by a field.

page.description: The offset for paginating requests. An offset defines a place in the results in order to fetch the next page of the results.

per_page.description: The number of results on each paginated request page.

chef.automate.api.compliance.reporting.s.description: Sort the results in ascending or descending order.

status.description: Overall aggregated status for all the reports.

chef.automate.api.compliance.reporting.s.description: Statistics on the overall compliance reports.

nodes.title:
Deprecated. int64 types render into string types when serialized to satisfy all browsers
Replaced by the `nodes_cnt` field

platforms.description: The number of unique node platforms in the reports.

environments.description: The number of unique environments in the reports.

profiles.description: The number of unique profiles in the reports.

nodes_cnt.description: The number of unique nodes scanned in the reports.

controls.description: The number of unique controls scanned in the reports.

os_name.description: OS Name compatible with the profile. This is legacy InSpec syntax.

os_family.description: OS Family compatible with the profile. This is legacy InSpec syntax.

release.description: OS Release compatible with the profile.

inspec_version.description: InSpec Version compatible with the profile.

platform_name.description: Platform Name compatible with the profile.

platform_family.description: Platform Family compatible with the profile.

report_time.description: Time in point for which the passed/failed/skipped data is valid.

passed.description: Total passed objects (nodes or controls) on the reports at the given report time.

failed.description: Total failed objects (nodes or controls) on the reports at the given report time.

skipped.description: Total skipped objects (nodes or controls) on the reports at the given report time.

waived.description: Total waived objects (nodes or controls) on the reports at the given report time.

trends.description: Set of statistics for passed/failed/skipped nodes or controls in a trendgraph friendly data format.

url.description: The URL of the profile accessible over HTTP or HTTPS.

path.description: The path to the profile on disk.

git.description: The git URL of the profile.

branch.description: The specific git branch of the dependency.

tag.description: The specific git tag of the dependency.

commit.description: The specific git commit of the dependency.

version.description: The specific git version of the dependency.

supermarket.description: The name of the dependency stored in Chef Supermarket.

github.description: The short name of the dependency stored on Github.

compliance.description: The short name of the dependency stored on the Chef Automate or Chef Compliance server.

status.description: The status of the dependency in the report.

skip_message.description: The reason this profile was skipped in the generated report, if any.
